beforeAll.sql: CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE GFDTCLI USING com.databricks.spark.csv OPTIONS (path "${basePath}GFDTCLI.csv", header "true", inferSchema "false")
CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE HE1_MX_CAT_ENT_FINAN_DRO USING com.databricks.spark.csv OPTIONS (path "${basePathDomain}HE1_MX_CAT_ENT_FINAN_DRO.csv", header "true", inferSchema "false")

source.sql: Select base.*, ref.COD_ENT REFERENCED_COD_ENT from GFDTCLI_standardized_and_validated base left outer join HE1_MX_CAT_ENT_FINAN_DRO ref on (base.COD_ENT = ref.COD_ENT and base.FCH_CORTE_DATOS = ref.FCH_CORTE_DATOS and base.NUM_VER_PROC = ref.NUM_VER_PROC)

beforeAll.sql: CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE HE1_MX_MAE_PERSONAS_DRO USING com.databricks.spark.csv OPTIONS (path "${basePathDomain}HE1_MX_MAE_PERSONAS_DRO.csv", header "true", inferSchema "false")

source.sql: Select base.*, ref.COD_PER REFERENCED_COD_PER from GFDTCLI_standardized_validated_and_domain_temp0 base left outer join HE1_MX_MAE_PERSONAS_DRO ref on (base.COD_ENT = ref.COD_ENT and base.FCH_CORTE_DATOS = ref.FCH_CORTE_DATOS and base.NUM_VER_PROC = ref.NUM_VER_PROC and base.COD_PER = ref.COD_PER)

beforeAll.sql: CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE HE1_MX_CAT_TAB_CORP_ALTAIR_DRO USING com.databricks.spark.csv OPTIONS (path "${basePathDomain}HE1_MX_CAT_TAB_CORP_ALTAIR_DRO.csv", header "true", inferSchema "false")

source.sql: Select base.*, ref.COD_CVE_REG REFERENCED_COD_CVE_REG from GFDTCLI_standardized_validated_and_domain_temp1 base left outer join HE1_MX_CAT_TAB_CORP_ALTAIR_DRO ref on (base.COD_ENT=ref.COD_ENT and base.COD_GRADO_FEVE=ref.COD_CVE_REG and base.NUM_VER_PROC=ref.NUM_VER_PROC and base.FCH_CORTE_DATOS=ref.FCH_CORTE_DATOS) where ref.COD_TAB_GEN='0608' and ref.COD_SIGLA_IDIOMA='E'

beforeAll.sql: CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE HE1_MX_CAT_INTERNO_DRO USING com.databricks.spark.csv OPTIONS (path "${basePathDomain}HE1_MX_CAT_INTERNO_DRO.csv", header "true", inferSchema "false")

source.sql: Select base.*, ref.COD_CVE_RGTRO REFERENCED_COD_CVE_RGTRO from GFDTCLI_standardized_validated_and_domain_temp2 base left outer join HE1_MX_CAT_INTERNO_DRO ref on (base.COD_EDO_FEVE=ref.COD_CVE_RGTRO and base.NUM_VER_PROC=ref.NUM_VER_PROC and base.FCH_CORTE_DATOS=ref.FCH_CORTE_DATOS) where ref.COD_CATALOGO='0005'

afterAll.sql: select * from errors_GFDTCLI_standardized_and_validated union all select * from errors_GFDTCLI_standardized_and_validated_and_domain0 union all select * from errors_GFDTCLI_standardized_and_validated_and_domain1 union all select * from errors_GFDTCLI_standardized_and_validated_and_domain2 union all select * from errors_GFDTCLI_standardized_and_validated_and_domain3
